p: The most striking effect came after 30 min PEO treatment, where 63% of cells became straight (Figures 2(c) and 2(d)). Only 12% had the typical spiral shape, and 25% showed a transient shape. At the applied concentration (150 μg mL −1) we have found no coccoid forms as described by other authors in the presence of other environmental stresses [ 31].
